name: Where's Joshua?
description:
Simple, free and addicting 3D arcade/action mini-game, where you play the role of an astronaut, Billie, that is on a mission to collect crystals in an alien planet. While doing his job, he finds himself upsetting too many aliens as they don't want their planet crystals removed. Every time Billie collects two crystals, a green, one eyed alien in a flying saucer appears and will kill the astronaut if it touches him. 

Collect as many  crystals as you can, every level has an increased objective and enemies will move faster as time and levels progress.

Play solo or connect a second controller to play co-op with a friend.

Lastly, don't forget Joshua, Billie's cat, he likes to appear whenever Billie collects all the crystal level objectives. Pick him up to go to the next level.
